product_name: Amphipod Beltpod SmartView Plus Cell Phone Pocket
long_description: Slip the Amphipod Beltpod SmartView(TM) Plus cell phone pocket on your belt to keep your smartphone or digital music player within reach while you're running, walking and hiking. Slip your smartphone into the easy-access main pocket via the secure zipper; fits phones and digital music players up to 5.5 x 3 x 0.5 in. Holds Android(TM), Windows(TM) and other large-format smartphones and players. Protective clear View-Thru(TM) front panel allows full screen access and touch control of your device. Cushioned extra pocket holds your keys, cash and credit card. Case is designed to accommodate all styles of headphone jacks. AirFlow(TM) mesh back channels wick moisture and circulates air. The Amphipod Beltpod SmartView(TM) Plus cell phone pocket can be worn vertically or horizontally on a belt (sold separately).
short_description: Slip the Amphipod Beltpod SmartView(TM) Plus cell phone pocket on your belt to keep your smartphone or digital music player within reach while you're running, walking and hiking.
